[[inst_hl_prfi_u]]
==== HL.PRFI.U

*Syntax:* hl.prfi.u{.l1,.l2,.l3} [SrcL, simm]

*Description:* Prefetch instruction for cache hint. Provides a hint to the processor that the specified memory location is likely to be accessed soon.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_prfi_u.svg[HL.PRFI.U encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA
